question:
Consider the following statements about the Jal Gram Yojana:
  1. Under this Yojna, two water-stressed villages in each district of the country are being selected for the water security and quality improvement.
  2. A district-level committee identifies the villages to be selected as Jal Grams
  3. This project is receiving financial support from World Bank
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. Under the Jal Gram Yojna, two water-stressed villages in each district of the country are being selected for the water security plan. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. A district-level committee identifies the villages to be selected as Jal Grams. <u>Third statement is incorrect</u>. The Yojna is not receiving any financial support from World Bank. Under this programme, village people are encouraged to generate mass awareness programme. Those involved in the awareness programme are called “Jal Mitra”. Woman panchayat members are also encouraged to become “Jal Mitra”. There are four important components of Jal Kranti Abhiyan viz. Jal Gram Yojana, Development of Model Command Area, Pollution Abatement and Mass Awareness Programme.
